steps.prompt: Read the content of the URL https://gohugo.io/shortcodes/gist/ to understand the instructions for creating a custom Gist shortcode.
Create the file `layouts/shortcodes/gist.html` and add the necessary code for the Gist shortcode as described in the Hugo documentation.
Create a pull request to merge the changes into the main branch. The pull request should have a title 'feat: Create Gist shortcode' and a body with a summary of the changes and a haiku.
